message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-value item. I'm willing to part with it for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $15,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. Could you do $10,000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I have to consider my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11,000. This is the lowest I can go.
